PALE IN COMPARISON.Definition: be significantly less important or impressive than

ENCOURAGED.Definition: advised or inspired him to do it

FOLLOW IN HIS FOOTSTEPS.Definition: do the same things or pursue the same path as he did

TRADEMARK.Definition: characteristic for which he is known
